description: Protein Docking Using a Single Representation for Protein Surface, Electrostatics, and Local Dynamics | protein docking using a density-based descriptor for atoms charge and dynamics | JabberDock provides a mechanism to dock two protein STID maps together in conjunction with the POW engine and BioBox | Shipped with this version of JabberDock is a heavily stripped version of biobox containing the functions JabberDock requires. Please move the biobox folder into whatever directory you like (e.g. your home), just make sure it's in your pythonpath There is a readme file in the biobox folder containing instructions on requirements and installation instructions
name: JabberDock
